posts.post_content:
Joe Tinker - Bat on Shoulder - SCG 10
Chief Bender - Trees in Background, Baltimore - SCG 1.5
John McGraw - Portrait 1.5

Sold
Don't mind the low post total, I have known the seller for over a decade and he is as solid as they come.

Those are nice cards with very reasonable prices.  If I didn't already have all three of these, I would pull the trigger.

Good luck with your sale.

Rick

I’ll take them.
Please PM me for your payment details.

Thank you for the opportunity (and the reference, Jobu!)
